Name: L'Anniversaire (The Birthday)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich yet bittersweet. A good after-dinner digestive.
History: Created in 2015 by Pier Schirru at Century Club in London, England
Nutrition: One serving of L'Anniversaire (The Birthday) contains 217 calories
